name: Tempesta Media
tag_list: content-marketing, content-development, unique-content, seo-content, content-on-demand, web-content, content, writing, publishing, content-monetization, syndicated-content, distributed-journalism, articles
overview:
Between 50% and 90% of new customers directly or indirectly originate from the Internet. To capture these customers, businesses need digital content. Most businesses have neither the expertise, nor the in-house resources to regularly and cost-effectively create and deploy digital content. Companies spent $5.2 billion on custom digital content in 2011. They will spend 44% more in 2012 trying to solve this problem.

As a first mover, we have developed a full-service, outsourced solution for businesses. The revolutionary service provides businesses with powerful publishing capabilities at a fraction of the price, time and administrative overhead of competing or in-house solutions.
